title: Ilya Aizenberg
home_p1: I'm Ilya Aizenberg, a creative professional specialized in Web Development. Welcome to my portfolio where I showcase my journey through coding, creativity, and problem-solving in the digital world.
home_p2: Whether you're here for professional collaboration or just to explore, I invite you to take a look at my projects, learn about my skills, and discover how my work can make a difference in the ever-evolving landscape of web technology.
